author: kevaundray
content:
<@543071464212004864> for testing in Kurtosis, could we use https://github.com/ethpandaops/dummy-el ?

This is for zk attester nodes that do not require an el (but we still want to satisfy the 1 cl to 1 el rule in kurtosis) 

Cc <@402080271563751435> and <@944007601400741989> for visibility

author: junsong_eth
content: Sounds nice. I've been building a local `dummy_el` image in my local environment while testing with [Kurtosis](https://github.com/developeruche/prysm/tree/poc/optional-proofs/kurtosis#running-scripts-with-local-images). It's nice to have a common image for testing. I'll update my custom scripts to use `ethpandaops/dummy-el`. Thanks!
